# [Interview #1182: Harold Washington Library Center-AU Tour, Entry #31](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1182#31)

#### Question

Can you write something about Szeth?

#### Brandon Sanderson

He writes something, not sure what it is.
